message.name: INF_NO_DEDUCTIONS_FOR_LIABILITY
message.locale: No deductions exist against this liability.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEM_XFV_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT_EMPTY
message.locale: The deduction amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEM_XFV_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT_LESS
message.locale: The deduction amount must be greater than the organisation minimum deduction amount of %1n.
The deduction amount must be greater than the organization minimum deduction amount of %1n.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEM_XFV_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT_GREATER
message.locale: The deduction amount cannot be greater than %1n, the maximum amount available for deduction off selected component.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEM_XFV_DEDUCTION_RATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The deduction rate must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEM_XFV_DEDUCTION_RATE_GREATER
message.locale: The deduction rate entered cannot be greater than %1n, the maximum organisation deduction rate.
The deduction rate entered cannot be greater than %1n, the maximum organization deduction rate.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEM_XFV_DEDUCTION_RATE_AVAILABLE
message.locale: The maximum rate left for deduction off this component is %1n.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEM_PMT_STARTDATE_FAILURE
message.locale: A deduction cannot be created from a date which has already been paid in respect of this case. The deduction can only be created from a date after '%1d'.

message.name: ERR_NO_NOMINEE_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: The delivery pattern selected for nominee '%1s', has no value on '%2d'. Please select a different delivery pattern for this period.

message.name: ERR_CASE_DEDUCTION_ITEM_FV_STATUS_CANCELED
message.locale: The deduction cannot be canceled as it has been canceled already.
The deduction cannot be cancelled as it has been cancelled already.

message.name: ERR_CASE_DEDUCTION_ITEM_FV_PAID
message.locale: The deduction cannot be deleted as deductions have already been processed. Consider ending the deduction, to prevent further deductions being processed. The earliest end date that can be recorded is '%1d'.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_ACCOUNT_NAME_ENTER
message.locale: Account name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_ACCOUNT_NUMBER_ENTER
message.locale: Account number must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_THIRD_PARTY_REG_DATE
message.locale: The start date of the third party deduction cannot be before the registration date of the third party - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_THIRD_PARTY_START_DATE
message.locale: The start date of the third party deduction cannot be after the end date of the third party.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_THIRD_PARTY_END_DATE
message.locale: The end date of the third party deduction cannot be after the end date of the third party.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_AMOUNT_ENTER
message.locale: Amount must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_AMOUNT_EXCEED_MAX
message.locale: Amount must not exceed the maximum amount for this deduction.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_AMOUNT_LESS_MIN
message.locale: Amount must not be less than minimum amount for this deduction.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_AMOUNT_RATE_ENTER
message.locale: Amount or percentage must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_AMOUNT_RATE_BOTH_ENTER
message.locale: Amount or percentage must be entered, but not both.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_NOMINEE_SELECT
message.locale: Nominee must be selected.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_MODIFY_THIRD_PARTY_CLOSED
message.locale: A third party deduction cannot be modified on a case with a status of closed.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_SAME_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: An active deduction of the same name already exists for this case with over lapping start and end dates.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_CASE_START_DATE
message.locale: The start date of the deduction cannot be before the case start date '%1d'.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_PARTICIPANT_START_DATE_AFTER
message.locale: The start date of the deduction cannot be before the start date of the participant for whom the deduction is being created.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_PARTICIPANT_END_DATE_BEFORE
message.locale: The start date of the deduction cannot be after the end date of the participant for whom the deduction is being created.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_RELATED_LIABILITY_START_DATE
message.locale: The deduction start date cannot be before the start date of the related liability case.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_PARTICIPANT_END_DATE_AFTER
message.locale: The end date of the deduction cannot be after the end date of the participant for whom the deduction is being created.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_PERCENTAGE_ENTER
message.locale: Percentage must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_PERCENTAGE_OUTSIDE_RANGE
message.locale: Percentage must not be less than 0 or greater than 100.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_PERCENTAGE_GREATER_MAX
message.locale: Percentage must not exceed the maximum percentage for this deduction.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_CREATE_THIRD_PARTY_CLOSED_CASE
message.locale: A third party deduction cannot be made from a case with a status of closed.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_MODIFY_CLOSED_CASE
message.locale: A deduction cannot be modified on a case with a status of closed.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_START_DATE_ENTER
message.locale: Start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_NAME_ENTER
message.locale: Deduction name must be selected.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_FV_ACTION_TYPE_SELECT
message.locale: Action type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_NOMINEE_COMPONENT_ENTER
message.locale: Deduction nominee or deduction component must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_NOMINEE_COMPONENT_BOTH_ENTER
message.locale: A nominee cannot be selected if a component is selected.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_AMOUNT_COMPONENT_BOTH_ENTER
message.locale: An amount cannot be specified for a component. Please select a nominee.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_PERCENTAGE_NOMINEE_BOTH_ENTER
message.locale: A percentage cannot be specified for a nominee. Please select a component.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_CLIENT_BLANK
message.locale: Deduction participant must be selected.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_CLIENT_MULTIPLE
message.locale: A Case Participant or Other Participant must be selected but not both.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_RV_PAYMENT_DETAILS_ENTER
message.locale: The Payment Frequency, Next Payment Date, Currency Type and Payment Method must be entered on the '%1c' home page before a third party deduction can be created.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_RV_PAYMENT_DETAILS_MODIFY
message.locale: The Payment Frequency, Currency Type and Payment Method must be entered as active deductions exist for this '%1c'.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_RV_DELIVERY_PATTERN_MODIFY
message.locale: Changing the delivery pattern will effect scheduled deductions on this case. You may wish to modify the start and end dates of these deductions.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XFV_START_DATE_AFTER_CASE_END
message.locale: Start date of the deduction cannot be later than the expected end date of the case.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_RV_PARTICIPANT_ENDED
message.locale: This %1s is in receipt of a third party deduction on %2s.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_XRV_RECIPIENT_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the recipient for a newly created Third Party Payment.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_CASE_LAST_PAYMENT_DATE
message.locale: The last payment on this case was paid up to %1d.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_INSERTED
message.locale: Deduction Created

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_ACTIVATED
message.locale: Deduction Activated

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_DEACTIVATED
message.locale: Deduction Deactivated

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_MODIFIED
message.locale: Deduction Modified

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_NATURAL_EXPIRY
message.locale: Deduction Expired

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_SKIPPED
message.locale: Deduction Skipped

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_LIABILITY_CLEARED
message.locale: Liability has been cleared

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_PROCESSED
message.locale: Deduction Processed Successfully

message.name: INF_THIRDPARTY_DEDUCTION_PROCESSED
message.locale: Deduction has been processed successfully and is due to be paid to the third party on %1d

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_CANCELLED
message.locale: Deduction Canceled
Deduction Cancelled

message.name: INF_CASEDEDUCTION_NOT_PROCESSED_UNDER_MIN_AMT
message.locale: The deduction has been skipped as the case payment did not cover the minimum deduction of %1n allowed for this deduction type.

message.name: INF_CASEDEDUCTION_NOT_PROCESSED_OVER_MAX_AMT
message.locale: The deduction has been skipped as it exceeds the maximum deduction amount of %1n allowed for this deduction type.

message.name: INF_CASEDEDUCTION_NOT_MAX_AMOUNT_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The deduction has been skipped as it exceeds the maximum deduction amount allowed for this case.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_NOT_PROCESSED_EXCEED_MAX_RATE
message.locale: This deduction has been skipped as it exceeded the allowed maximum deduction rate.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_PARTIALLY_PROCESSED
message.locale: Deduction Partially Processed - processing the full amount of %1s would result in an over-allocation on the liability.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS
message.locale: The deduction has been skipped as the case payment is not sufficient to cover the deduction.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_NOMINEE_NOT_RECEIVING_PAYMENTS
message.locale: The deduction has been skipped as the nominee %1s is no longer receiving payments.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_NOMINEE_NO_LIABILITIES
message.locale: There are no active or outstanding liabilities for this participant.

message.name: INF_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT_ZERO
message.locale: The deduction has been skipped as the deduction amount is zero.

message.name: ERR_XRV_UNAPPLIED_DEDUCTION_MAX_AMOUNT
message.locale: The amount specified cannot be greater than the reissued amount.

message.name: INF_REISSUE_DEDUCTION_PAYMENT
message.locale: You are about to reissue a payment of %1n after applying an un-applied deduction of %2n.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLIED_DEDUCTION_MAX_AMOUNT
message.locale: The amount specified cannot be greater than the outstanding liability.

message.name: ERR_XRV_APPLIED_DEDUCTION_MAX_DEFAULT_AMOUNT
message.locale: The amount specified cannot be greater than the default amount returned by the API.

message.name: INF_REISSUE_APPLIED_DEDUCTION_PAYMENT
message.locale: You are about to reissue a payment of %1n after applying a deduction of %2n towards the liability %3s.
